full_text:
EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.

	All of the provisions of this article, or any part of, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in the agreement in clear and unambiguous terms.  Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not constitute, or be permitted, as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of this article.
plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT. (§ 183.07)

  EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.	All of the provisions of this
article, or any part of, may be waived in a bona fide collective bargaining
agreement, but only if the waiver is explicitly set forth in the agreement in
clear and unambiguous terms.  Unilateral implementation of terms and conditions
of employment by either party to a collective bargaining relationship shall not
constitute, or be permitted, as a waiver of all or any part of the provisions of
this article.

EXEMPTION FOR COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENT.
